titles.title: Increased Aviation Safety through Contract Towers Act
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to authorize grants from the small airport fund for the construction or improvement of a nonapproach control tower.
Increased Aviation Safety through Contract Towers Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Increased Aviation Safety through Contract Towers Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Transportation to provide grants to an airport sponsor for the construction or improvement of a nonapproach control tower and for the acquisition and installation of air traffic control, communications, and related equipment to be used in that tower.
